entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
